message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business.  While I can't disclose the exact details of the product right now, I can assure you that it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm offering it to you for [Insert Price Here], which I believe is a fair and competitive price considering its potential.  If you're interested, we can schedule a time to discuss the product further and explore its potential benefits for your company. Let me know your thoughts.
